entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or ice pellets. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:36 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
